thread.section_title: The Soho Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fab hotel in perfect location.
thread.title_full: Fab hotel in perfect location. - Review of The Soho Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Mary H
title: Fab hotel in perfect location.
text: We stayed here on the 26th of February and it was just fab. From arrival to check out the staff could not do enough for you. Bruno in particular who showed us the rooms before we checked in to make sure they were to our liking. The breakfast was just fab and we also had a lovely evening meal in the restaurant. We would definitely stay here again without hesitation. The bedrooms and bathrooms are just the best.
